definition: to take the lid off/to expose/to unmask
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: If anyone can understand that compulsion to expose injustice, it's Assange.
sentences.chinese: 而最能理解揭黑衝動的人，恰恰是阿桑奇自己。

definition: to expose/to unmask/to ferret out/to disclose/disclosure
to fight counterfeiting/to expose as false/to denounce sb's lies
to discredit/to defame/to smear sb's name/to bring shame upon (oneself or one's family etc)/to blacken (e.g. commando's face for camouflage)/to black out or obliterate (e.g. censored words)
(slang) (lit.) to tear cunt/(fig.) (of females) to have a catfight/to have a bitch fight
rational, neutral, objective (abbr. for 理性、中立、客觀|理性、中立、客观[li3 xing4 , zhong1 li4 , ke4 guan1])
to show off (loanword, from English "show")/to grandstand/to perform in a stage show
public intellectual (sometimes used derogatorily)/abbr. for 公共知識分子|公共知识分子[gong1 gong4 zhi1 shi5 fen4 zi3]
